text: Namɨlaŋ 2.17 Snd 24.21, Mt 22.21, Lom 12.10, Fl 2.3, Ib 13.1, 1 Pi 1.22 hulaŋ iamɨgali sɨkasɨkan agɨladɨ ibi mɨŋaiahɨhalaŋ uami. Lɨdɨŋ hulaŋ iamɨgali Jisasɨ saŋ hɨji vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ lamavɨlalɨ agɨlasaŋ mavɨn hekɨlɨ hɨnihalaŋ uami. Namɨlaŋ Asɨ saŋ lɨdalɨda nudɨ lɨhu hɨvɨ hɨnihalaŋ uami. Lɨdɨŋ manɨgali fɨli tɨbɨ migɨlɨlalɨ agadɨ ibi mɨŋaiahɨhalaŋ uami.
